de.businesscode.bcdui.wrs.load

Class WrsPagination

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.businesscode.bcdui.wrs.load.WrsPagination

  • public class WrsPagination
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information about server-side pagination of a request Initially taken from WrsSqlGenerator. For older change history see there
